title: Litro says no domestic LP gas distribution tomorrow
body_lines: Distribution of domestic LP gas cylinders tomorrow (May 28) is not carried out tomorrow (May 27), Litro Gas Lanka Limited says.
The company said a shipment of liquefied petroleum gas is expected to arrive in Sri Lanka in the coming days.
Accordingly, tomorrow will be the fifth consecutive day that domestic gas cylinders (12.5kg, 5kg and 2.3kg) are not distributed the island-wide.
